headache control a formula type
technique that you can use to practice
stopping the migraine type headache
if you have a migraine headache enter
level 1 with the three to one method
once at level one go through the same
procedure as in the tension type
headache application
but use three applications five minutes
apart
you will note that the first application

certain amount

third application
